sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Palestinian Authority leader Mahmoud Abbas calls Israel's actions in the Gaza Strip a genocide after a meeting with U.S. top diplomat Antony Blinken.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A high security surprise visit to the occupied West Bank by U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: There, Mahmoud Abbas, leader of the Palestinian National Authority, told him a genocide was unfolding in Gaza by Israel, as Blinken warned against the forced displacement of Palestinians from the Gaza Strip.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Washington had proposed localized pauses in fighting to allow in humanitarian aid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Israel's Prime Minister, Benjamin Netanyahu, rejected this when he met with Blinken on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The trip also comes on the back of two stops in Jordan and Israel days earlier.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Despite the secrecy, once word of the visit got leaked, protests erupted in the West Bank to denounce Blinken's presence and the U.S.'s support of Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Later, the American diplomat is due to travel to Ankara to meet with Turkish counterpart and perhaps meet President Erdogan on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Israeli warplanes struck the Maghazi refugee camp in central Gaza early on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Palestinian health ministry officials say the strikes have killed at least 30 people and wounded more than 40.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The camp is located in the evacuation zone where Israel's military had urged Palestinians in Gaza to seek refuge.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This comes as Israel vows to crush the territory's Hamas rulers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: At the end of the war, there will be no more Hamas in Gaza, there will be no security threat from Gaza's side against Israel, and Israel will have complete freedom to perform any security action it wants against anyone who puts his head in Gaza." Israel's heavy bombardment of Gaza has intensified, particularly in the north where many civilians remain trapped and unable to flee.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Health officials there say since October 7th, Israel has killed more than 9,000 Palestinians in the strip, in retaliation for the 1,400 Israelis killed in the Hamas militant attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Moldovans went to the polls on Sunday for local elections taking place alongside fears that Russia is trying to undermine the vote.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The country sits next to Ukraine and one of the main issues dominating this campaign trail is the possibility of Moldova's membership to the bloc.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Two days ahead of the election, Moldova's prime minister banned candidates from the pro-Russia chance party.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: After the country's national intelligence agency alleged Moscow tried to influence the electoral process via the party, some 600 candidates were affected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some 600 candidates were affected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Sunday's ballot will elect nearly 900 mayors and 11,000 local councillors for a four-year term.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: No rest for southwestern Europe as France, Portugal and Spain brace for a second major storm in a row coming from the Atlantic. Storm Domingos, as it's called, has forced 13 French departments to issue orange flood alerts due to winds blowing up to 150 kilometers per hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's blowing, but I'm used to it, we're from Brittany, so we wanted to avoid the storm in Brittany to be less extreme than its predecessor Kirin, which is yet to fully calm and has caused significant damage and casualties across the western part of the continent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: For many, it is time to evaluate the damage the unusually violent storm left in its wake.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: At least 19 people have died from Storm Kiran.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Thousands were evacuated in Tuscany due to the heavy rainfall.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A hostage situation at Hamburg airport involving a young child has ended after 18 hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: airport involving a young child has ended after 18 hours. The man drove through a security barrier and onto the tarmac on Saturday night with his four-year-old daughter in the car and parked under a plane. Police said the man shot his weapon twice in the air and through burning bottles from the vehicle. He eventually gave himself up without resistance and was arrested. The incident disrupted several flights in and out of the airport. Authorities believe the situation involved a custody dispute.
